name: Tank
description: Bolster – Damaging abilities deal 1 less attack to you for 1 turn.

name: Ranged
description: Aimed Shot – After 1 turn, deal 3 attack to your target.

name: Healer
description: 2 healing per turn, Ability – Give a target +1 health.

name: Barbarian
description: +1 attack on front line, chance to survive fatal combat at 1 HP.

name: Rogue
description: Stealth – Backline only, +2 attack from stealth.

name: Hunter
description: On play, summons a 2/2 Wolf to closest adjacent tile.

name: Storm Caller
description: Deal 1 attack to 1–3 enemies.

name: Banshee
description: Wail – Reduce ATK of nearby enemies by 1 for 1 turn.

name: Armorer
description: Craft Armor – Grants +2 temp armor to adjacent minion.

name: Wandering Healer
description: Heals adjacent friendly unit for 1 at end of your turn.

name: Grizzled Veteran
description: Takes 1 less attack from abilities.

name: Field Scout
description: Gains +1 attack if placed in the backline.

name: Mercenary
description: No faction. Has +2 attack when no friendly units are adjacent.

name: Torchbearer
description: On attack, remove stealth from adjacent targets.

name: War Banner
description: adjacent minions get +2 ATK, front line only.

name: Banner of Command
description: all friendly frontliners get +1 ATK.

name: Banner of the Brave
description: grants +1 permanent ATK to units that move front from back line.

name: Staff of Ember
description: Grants fire attack with burn chance, mages get Fiery Wake.

name: Blooming Wildstaff
description: Heal 1 HP/turn, healers gain Rejuvenation.

name: Polearm
description: Allows melee units to attack from the back line.

name: Flaming Sword
description: +2 ATK, applies 1 burn attack for 2 turns.

name: Frostbrand Axe
description: +1 ATK, 50% chance to freeze target for 1 turn.

name: Twin Daggers
description: +1 ATK, allows attacking twice per action.

name: Orb of Chaos
description: Targeted magical abilities hit 1–2 extra targets.

name: Executioner's Axe
description: On kill, can attack again this turn.

name: Tome of Countering
description: +1 ATK, grants 'Spell Lock' (cancels next enemy spell, 3-turn cooldown).

name: Explosive Arrow Quiver
description: Attacks deal splash attack to adjacent enemies.

name: Sharpened Arrows
description: Every second attack deals +2 attack.

name: Hookshot
description: Grants 'Hookshot' ability – pull target from back line.

name: Amulet of Flux
description: Each spell cast gives this unit +1 ATK this turn.

name: Iron Sword
description: +1 attack.

name: Chainmail
description: +1 armor, +1 health.

name: Healing Stone
description: Once per turn, restore 2 HP to this unit.

name: Spyglass
description: Grants +1 attack if the target is on the backline.

name: Quickblade
description: Allows a second attack at -1 attack.

name: Master of Decay
description: Passive – Gravebound: Gain 1 Soul whenever a friendly unit dies. Hero Power (2 mana): Necrotic Pulse – Spend 1 Soul to deal 2 attack or heal 2 HP.

name: Bone Thrall
description: Frontline only, on death summon a 1/1 Remnant.

name: Rotting Ghoul
description: Frontline only, on death deal 1 attack to adjacent enemies.

name: Bone Warden
description: Units behind this take 1 less attack.

name: Ghastly Archer
description: +1 attack to enemies under 50% HP.

name: Soul Collector
description: Gains 1 HP when friendly minion dies.

name: Carrion Bat
description: On kill, draw 1 card.

name: Crypt Reaver
description: Attacks 2 adjacent enemies.

name: Wailing Banshee
description: On play, silence all enemies in a column.

name: Dead Knight
description: Can't be healed, on kill summon Bone Thrall.

name: Undying Horror
description: Deathrattle – return this to your hand.

name: Raise Dead
description: Resurrect random friendly unit with 1 HP / 1 ATK.

name: Soul Burn
description: Deal 3 attack, heal hero for attack dealt.

name: Dark Pact
description: Destroy friendly unit, draw 2 cards.

name: Mass Grave
description: Resurrect all Bone Thralls / Skeletons where they died.

name: Unholy Surge
description: All undead gain +1 ATK this turn.

name: Tome of Eternal Rot
description: Once/turn, when a unit dies, reduce cost of a random spell by 1.

name: Scythe of Sorrow
description: +2 ATK, on kill gain +1 temp mana next turn.

name: Skull Lantern
description: If a minion returns from graveyard, draw 1 card (once per turn).

name: Warrior
description: Passive – Loyal command: After your hero takes damage, your next minion gains +1 attack. Hero Power (2 mana): Battle Cry – Give a frontline unit +1 attack and +1 health this turn.

name: Grunt
description: Gains +1 HP if you played a weapon this turn.

name: Shield Recruit
description: Taunt. Takes 1 less damage from the first hit each turn.

name: Battlefield Berserker
description: Gains +1 attack when any unit dies this turn.

name: Spear Sentry
description: Frontline, first time it takes damage, deal 2 damage to attacker.

name: Warhound Rider
description: Charge. Gains +1 HP if placed behind another unit.

name: Ironclad Veteran
description: When equipped with a weapon, draw a card.

name: Blademaster Adept
description: Double strike if it attacks first.

name: Siege Commander
description: Adjacent frontline allies gain +1 attack.

name: Warlord's Guard
description: Frontline only. When healed, gain +1 armor.

name: Rageborn Crusher
description: Cannot be frozen or stunned. When damaged, deal 1 to all enemies.

name: Shield Wall
description: Give a random front line minion +2 armor, draw a card.

name: Blood Rush
description: Your units gain +1 attack this turn.

name: Crushing Blow
description: Deal 4 damage to a frontline enemy.

name: Warpath
description: All enemies take 2 damage.

name: Execute
description: Instantly kill a damaged enemy minion.

name: Second Wind
description: Heal a minion for 5. If the minion is still damaged, draw a card.

name: Unbreakable Will
description: Give a unit "Cannot die this turn" and +3 armor.

name: Brutal Axe
description: +2 attack. Deal 1 splash damage to adjacent targets.

name: Spiked Shield
description: +1 armor. Deal 1 damage to attackers while equipped.

name: Warhammer of Wrath
description: +3 attack, breaks after 2 attacks.

name: Gladiator's Chains
description: Melee unit can't be moved, gains +1 attack.

name: Bloodsteel Gauntlets
description: After this unit attacks, restore 1 HP.

name: Banner of Might
description: All minions with weapons gain +1 attack.

name: Juggernaut Helm
description: Grants "Unstoppable" – cannot be rooted, stunned, or pulled.

name: Executioner's Flail
description: +2 attack, if target has less than 50% HP, deal +2 damage.

name: Wildcaller
description: Passive – Pack Instincts: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, it gains +1 attack if another Beast is already in play. Hero Power (2 mana): Command Beast – Choose a Beast. It gains +1 movement or +1 attack this turn.

name: Wild Cub
description: Gains +1/+1 if another Beast is in play.

name: Tusked Boar
description: Frontline only. On death, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

name: Wolf Pack
description: Summons two wolves with Pack Tactics (+1 attack if beside another wolf).

name: Falcon Scout
description: Backline, reveal a random card in opponent's hand.

name: Dire Panther
description: Stealth. If undamaged for a turn, gains +2 attack.

name: Alpha Howler
description: At the start of your turn, adjacent Beasts gain +1 attack.

name: Horned Charger
description: Charge. On attack, pushes the enemy to the back line, or stun for one turn if already there.

name: Grizzly Guardian
description: Taunt. When damaged, adjacent allies gain +1 armor.

name: Venomfang Serpent
description: Attacks apply poison: 1 damage per turn for 2 turns.

name: Ancient Stag
description: Backline only. Passive: All beasts cost 1 less mana.

name: Beast Bond
description: Choose a Beast. It gains "Cannot be targeted" this turn.

name: Pack Hunt
description: Summon two 2/1 Wolves.

name: Call of the Alpha
description: All Beasts gain +2 attack this turn.

name: Nature's Roar
description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Beasts heal for 1.

name: Mark Prey
description: Mark a target. Next Beast to attack it deals double damage.

name: Tracking
description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw a Beast.

name: Overwhelm
description: All Beasts deal damage to adjacent enemies when attacking this turn.

name: Hunter's Spearhead
description: +1 attack, deals +1 against Beasts.

name: Fang Necklace
description: Equipped Beast gains +1 attack for each other friendly Beast.

name: Alpha's Crest
description: Backline item – Your Beasts have +1 health.

name: Whip of Command
description: Grants "Command: Move a friendly Beast one tile" once per turn.

name: Claw Gauntlets
description: +1 attack, attacks apply bleed (1 damage at end of turn).

name: spirit hide Armor
description: +2 armor. When hit, summon a 1/1 Cub with Taunt.

name: Callhorn
description: Once per game: Summon a 3/3 Alpha Wolf with Charge and Taunt.

name: Totem of the Wild
description: Beasts you summon this turn get +1/+1.

name: Arcane Colossus
description: When played, deal 3 damage to the enemy. Spells cost 1 more while this is in play.

name: War Mammoth
description: Trample - When attacking, deals 2 damage to units behind the target.

name: Divine Healer
description: At the end of your turn, restore 1 health to all friendly units and your hero.

name: Master Tactician
description: When played, rearrange your units in any formation. All friendly units gain +1 attack this turn.

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: +3 armor, reduces all spell damage taken by 2.

name: Staff of Dominion
description: +2 attack. Once per turn, take control of an enemy unit with 2 or less health until end of turn.

name: Banner of Victory
description: All friendly units gain +1/+1. When this is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

name: Lich Lord
description: When any unit dies, gain 1 Soul. Spend 2 Souls: Resurrect a random friendly unit at full health.

name: Plague Harbinger
description: All enemy units take 1 damage at the start of their turn. When an enemy dies to this effect, summon a 2/2 Zombie.

name: Death's Embrace
description: Destroy all units with 2 or less health. For each friendly unit destroyed, gain 1 Soul and draw 1 card.

name: Warbringer
description: Whenever this attacks, all other friendly units gain +1 attack until end of turn. Cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

name: Elite Guard Captain
description: Frontline only. All friendly frontline units take 1 less damage. When played, give all frontline allies +0/+2.

name: Battle Frenzy
description: All friendly units gain +2/+1 and can attack twice this turn. At the end of turn, they take 1 damage.

name: Alpha Warlord
description: When played, summon two 3/2 Dire Wolves with Charge. All Beasts have +1 attack while this is in play.

name: Stampede
description: Summon a Beast from your deck to each empty tile in your frontline. They all gain Charge this turn.

name: Elder Thunderhoof
description: When damaged, stun all enemy units in the same row for 1 turn. Cannot be moved.
